comment: /**  * Handles a rest request.  * @param request The request to handle  * @param channel The channel to write the request response to  * @param client A client to use to make internal requests on behalf of the original request  */
code: /**  * Handles a rest request.  * @param request The request to handle  * @param channel The channel to write the request response to  * @param client A client to use to make internal requests on behalf of the original request  */ void handleRequest(RestRequest request, RestChannel channel, NodeClient client) throws Exception.

comment: /**  * Indicates if the RestHandler supports content as a stream. A stream would be multiple objects delineated by  * {@link XContent#streamSeparator()}. If a handler returns true this will affect the types of content that can be sent to  * this endpoint.  */
code: /**  * Indicates if the RestHandler supports content as a stream. A stream would be multiple objects delineated by  * {@link XContent#streamSeparator()}. If a handler returns true this will affect the types of content that can be sent to  * this endpoint.  */ default boolean supportsContentStream() {     return false. }
